abstract: Charlotte, NC, Police Officer Randall Kerrick delivers testimony in which he describes fearing for his life when he shot and killed Jonathan Ferrel, unarmed black man; Kerrick faces voluntary manslaughter charges.
lead_paragraph: A white police officer testified that he repeatedly fired his gun at Jonathan Ferrell, an unarmed black man, because the man charged at him repeatedly and he did not think his weapon was working.

headline.main: In Testimony, Officer Recalls Fatal Shooting in Charlotte
headline.print_headline: In Testimony, Officer Recalls Fatal Shooting in Charlotte
